
= Introduction =

GPIO output and input linux application


= Details =

gpio_out : Blink DS23 LED 

gpio_in  : Trigger Push button SW14

GPIO device driver uses sysfs.

gpio_out uses usleep() to wait for 1 sec.

gpio_in uses interruptible_sleep_on() and wake_up_interruptible() to wait for GPIO IRQ.

= Execution =

Compile linux kernel from Petalinux 2014.1 release with updated driver gpio-zynq.c(devicedriver folder) & boot linux.

excute ./gpio_in or ./gpio_out.

watch LED DS23 or push SW14.
